Guard Kelios:
A lot of adventurers have tried to help out, but the Outlaw Forest is still bursting at the seams with outlaws. If we don't reduce their numbers, the danger might reach Oren. The mission is for you to slay the monsters here.
As a proof, collect Destroyed Gargoyle Fragments from the Hunter Gargoyle, Basilisk Scales from Tarlk Basilisk and Elder Tarlk Basilisk, and Mahum ID Tags from the other Mahum monsters.
